plugin.name: Apache Maven ACR Plugin
plugin.description: Generates a J2EE Application Client file.

mojo.description: Build a JavaEE Application Client jar file from the current project.

parameter.name: archive
parameter.description: The archive configuration to use. See Maven Archiver Reference.

parameter.name: escapeBackslashesInFilePath
parameter.description: To escape interpolated value with windows path. c:\foo\bar will be replaced with c:\\foo\\bar. Starting with 3.0.0 the property has been renamed from acr.escapeBackslashesInFilePath to maven.acr.escapeBackslashesInFilePath.

parameter.name: escapeString
parameter.description: An expression preceded with this String won't be interpolated. \${foo} will be replaced with ${foo}. Starting with 3.0.0 the property has been renamed from acr.escapeString to maven.acr.escapeString.

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description:
The files and directories to exclude from the main Application Client jar. Usage: <excludes> <exclude>**/*DevOnly.class</exclude> </excludes>
Default exclusions: META-INF/application-client.xml,

parameter.name: filterDeploymentDescriptor
parameter.description: To filter the deployment descriptor. Starting with 3.0.0 the property has been renamed from acr.filterDeploymentDescriptor to maven.acr.filterDeploymentDescriptor.

parameter.name: filters
parameter.description: Filters (properties files) to include during the interpolation of the deployment descriptor.

parameter.name: jarName
parameter.description: The name of the Application client JAR file to generate.

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: Directory that resources are copied to during the build. Starting with 3.0.0 the property has been renamed from outputDirectory to maven.acr.outputDirectory.

mojo.description: Display help information on maven-acr-plugin. Call mvn acr:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.
